sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"物质，东西"之意。
means: material ： 通常指组成客观存在物的部分或其原料。
matter ： 通常指构成实物的物质，与精神相对立。在科学上，指占有空间，并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。
substance ： 多指某一种形式的物质，既可指元素也可指化合物。
stuff ： 多用于日常生活中，非正式用词。常指构成整体的所有部分、物体或项目。有时指劣等材料，含轻蔑意味。

word_mean: 质，物质：构成身体或器官的材料

sentence.Network_en: This substance has now been cloned by molecular biologists.
sentence.Network_cn: 该物质现在已被分子生物学家克隆。

sentence.Network_en: Syria will attend only if the negotiations deal with issues of substance.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有在谈判涉及重大问题时叙利亚才会参加。

sentence.Network_en: There is no substance in any of these allegations.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... instantaneous a 同时发生的 substance n 物质；本质 substantial a 本质的；实在的.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... subsist 存在 substance 物质;实质 substantial 大量.
实体（Substance），又译为本体，是西方哲学史上的重要范畴。其含义一般指一个本质上独立自存和同一不变的存有，作为一切属性 …
好枕头的本质(Substance)：合适(Fit)的高度。枕头，要量了再买！

list.abs: 有关环境污染的英语词汇 ... thermal pollution 热污染 toxic substances 有毒物质 toxic waste 有毒废物.
化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译(D-I) ... fluorescent screen 荧光膜 fluorescent substance 荧光物质 fluoride 氟化物.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... harmful gas 有害气体 harmful substance 有害物质 harmonic 和睦.
英语警示语_百度知道 ... POISON 有毒物品 RADIOACTIVE SUBSTANCE 放射性物质 GUARD AGAINST DAMP 注意防潮.

lj.lj_ly: basic rights are equivalent in substance to human rights.
lj.lj_ls: 基本权利大体上等同于人权。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting the essential nature of something): from Old French, from Latin substantia 'being, essence', from substant- 'standing firm', from the verb substare

entry.def: A substance is a solid, powder, liquid, or gas with particular properties.

example.ex: There's absolutely no regulation of cigarettes to make sure that they don't include poisonous substances...
example.tran: 根本没有法规来确保香烟不含有毒物质。

example.ex: The substance that's causing the problem comes from the barley.
example.tran: 引起该问题的物质来自大麦。

entry.def: Substance is the quality of being important or significant.

example.ex: It's questionable whether anything of substance has been achieved...
example.tran: 是否已经取得了任何实质性进展还是个问题。

example.ex: Syria will attend only if the negotiations deal with issues of substance.
example.tran: 只有在谈判涉及重大问题时叙利亚才会参加。

entry.tran: 主旨;要点;实质;基本内容
entry.def: The substance of what someone says or writes is the main thing that they are trying to say.

example.ex: The substance of his discussions doesn't really matter.
example.tran: 他讨论的要点实际上根本不重要。

entry.def: If you say that something has no substance, you mean that it is not true.

example.ex: There is no substance in any of these allegations.

entry.tran: 财力雄厚的;有权有势的；有影响力的
entry.def: A person of substance has a lot of money, power, or influence.

means.word_mean: 1. that which has mass and occupies space;

sentences.sentence: "an atom is the smallest indivisible unit of matter"

means.word_mean: 2. the stuff of which an object consists
3. the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience;

sentences.sentence: "the heart and soul of the Republican Party"
"What is the meaning of this proverb?"

means.word_mean: 6. what a communication that is about something is about

auth_sentence.content: The substance of choice is alcohol, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: The substance of choice is alcohol, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The substance of choice is alcohol, he said.

auth_sentence.content: Marling may be young, but she has substance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Marling may be young, but she has substance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Marling may be young, but she has substance.

auth_sentence.content: Blood was the substance that bound the kindred together.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blood was the substance that bound the kindred together.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blood was the substance that bound the kindred together.

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stems_affixes.word_buile: stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+ing状态→n.站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物质;实质,本质;主旨;财产,资产
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+stance=stan站,立→放在下面之物
stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使符合标准, 使标准化
stems_affixes.word_buile: standard[n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的]+ize表动词→v.使符合标准, 使标准化

Sentence.sentence: In contrast," the researchers continue, "many regulations that don't assume people make rational choices have been successfully applied to control alcohol, a substance — like food — of which immoderate consumption leads to serious health problems.

a parent, relative, friend, or doctor outside the family, had higher self-esteem, higher grades, and lower substance use than peers whose role models were sports figures, singers, or other media characters.
Oil is the substance that lubricates the world's economy
Some brand-name coffees contain harmful substances.

means.word_mean: 物质, 物品, 东西

sentences.en: Soil consists of various chemical substances.
sentences.cn: 土壤由各种化学物质组成。

means.word_mean: 主旨, 要旨, 要点, 实质, 基本内容

sentences.en: The substance of their talk is condensed into a paragraph.
sentences.cn: 他们谈话的要旨被压缩成一段话。

sentences.en: Is there any substance to their claim?
sentences.cn: 他们的要求有实质内容吗?

sentences.en: There isn't anything of real substance in her book.
sentences.cn: 她的书中没有任何真正实质性的内容。
